name: Invincible
description:
You play an invincible dual-shield wielding hero. A paragon of strength, arrows break upon your body harmlessly. Protect your loved ones with your body itself, and keep them alive for as long as possible!

Made for the #WeeklyGameJam 21. The theme was Save a life. This is my first time entering a game jam (and building a stand alone game really). I didn't get a lot of what I wanted to do done, and the art style is all just placeholders but I really learnt a lot.
